long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve your productivity by learning to focus in spans of 30 minutes sprints.

Sprinter provides you a simple and easy interface to set up a Timer schedule. Each time you start the timer it will initiate a sprint of 30 minutes. 

You get to see the progress of the current timer by using the hyper link show progress.

Check your Sprints completed each day by clicking the Show Sprints option and keep  improving your score each day.

Want to reset the timer and begin a New day, click on Clear Sprints.
